Creating our very First Array 
```
?array()
array_1 <-array(1:24, dim=c(3,4,2))
array_1
is.array(array_1)
```
 DIM == "Integer vector of length one or more giving the maximal indices in each dimension."
 Above we have ROWS == 3 , COLUMNS == 4 and DIMENSIONS == 2
